title: Costume Design for a Boyar
medium: Gouache, graphite on  buff-colored wove paper
description: Russian Constructivist-style costume design of a grey-bearded old man in a long blue robe and maroon coat and hat with black (fur?) trim. One up-turned hand is raised across figure's chest.
